title: Trendatory Capitalism 5/23: TikTok, Mike Pence, Morgan Freeman, U.S. State Logos, NBA
itunes:title: Trendatory Capitalism 5/23: TikTok, Mike Pence, Morgan Freeman, U.S. State Logos, NBA
description:
In this edition of Trendatory Capitalism, Jack and Miles discuss record labels forcing popstars to make viral TikToks, Mike Pence "being open" to running in 2024 (or, "Dear God, please make me Prezzy"), Morgan Freeman being barred from Russia along with other U.S. presidents, U.S. state logos, and NBA finals!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
